data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Lleida, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Lleida, Cataluña, Spain
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Lleida.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the county of Lleida.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Lleida that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Balaguer
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Balaguer, Cataluña, Spain.
Jesus, strengthen the church in Lleida, Cataluña, Spain by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the county of Lleida who will make disciples who make disciples.

data.section_summary:
the county of Lleida, Cataluña, Spain has a population of 436,400.

We estimate Lleida has 6,988 people who might know Jesus, 330,391 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 99,021 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 62 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 6,988 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.
